postData.contentHtml:
Lately, I've been reading about OpenAI's ChatGPT over on HackerNews. I find it interesting, not necessarily fascinating. Although, it does inspire me to be curious about how the different facets of software work. As such, the beginning of this informal, technical blog as an attempt to become versed.

I certainly have an affinity to specific areas of software, e.g., the web. A large focus will then lie in the web development domain. But ultimately, expect to see anything technical-related.
postData.title: hello, world
